ingredients.description: beef stock or water for basting

steps.text: First, let's prepare the goulash.
Pour oil into a thick-bottomed pot.
Add the sliced ​​meat to the pot.
While the goulash is cooking, prepare the bread dumplings.
Pour oil into a deep-bottomed shrimp, then add chopped onion, salt it a little and fry it over low heat until it caramelizes.
Cut the bread into centimeter cubes.
Add eggs, cooled and fried onions and chopped parsley to the soaked bread.
Use an ice cream scoop (this is the easiest way) to scoop up lumps of bread dough and shape them into dumplings.
Roll the dumplings in breadcrumbs, then cook them for about 15 minutes in salted dill.
Remove the boiled dumplings with foam from the dill and serve them together with the goulash.

ingredients.description: teaspoons of dried oregano (or 1 tablespoon of fresh)
teaspoons of dried thyme (or 1 tablespoon of fresh)

steps.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package, then drain and place in a large bowl.
Clean and wash the vegetables.
Pour olive oil into the pan and fry the garlic for three minutes at a low temperature.
Toss the vegetables into the bowl with the pasta.
The pasta salad can be served lukewarm or completely chilled.

ingredients.description: tuna in olive oil (2 cans of 80 g each)

steps.text: Boil the eggs hard (recipe is HERE) and cool them down.
Peel the cooled eggs and remove the yolks, and cut the whites into pieces.
The prepared spread is served with bread, toast or crackers.
First, let's prepare the blueberry sauce.
To prepare the lemon syrup, put the shrimp with lemon juice, grated peel, sugar and water on the stove.
Whip the cream and sugar until soft peaks form.
Let's prepare the glasses in which we will serve the dessert.
Cool the dessert well before serving.

ingredients.description: thicker neck steaks (from 4-6 steaks, about 1 cm thick)
white wine (if we prefer, we can also use red wine)
oblong peppers (red and yellow or green)
3-4 dl beef stock base (can also be water)

steps.text: Wash the steaks and dry them with paper towels.
Peel the onion and garlic and finely chop them separately.
Place a pot on the cooker, which can later be placed in the oven (a larger fireproof pan can also be used).
Pour the onion into the bowl and fry it while stirring until it turns translucent and softens.
First, stir the tomato concentrate into the fried vegetables, then pour in the wine.
Return the browned steaks to the pot.
After 1.5 hours of cooking, check if the steaks are sufficiently tender.
The steaks are served on plates and served together with the sauce from the pot.

ingredients.description: prosecco, sparkling wine or dry white wine

steps.text: Fill the wine glass almost to the top with ice.
Pour Aperol and soda into the glass.
Sift the flour into a bowl, make a well in the middle and pour water in which the sugar has been dissolved.
When the yeast rises, sprinkle salt over the flour, and then use a kitchen mixer to knead the dough, which will be very sticky.
After five minutes of kneading, add more oil and continue kneading so that the oil is slowly absorbed.
Flour the counter well and roll the dough onto it.
After the second rise, gently roll the balls from the center outwards into buns.
Pierce each bun with a fork or use the blunt side of a dough spatula or knife to make grid-shaped prints.
Bake the buns for 10 minutes, the last two minutes under the grill, so that they will be nicely colored.
First, prepare the strawberry jelly.
Pour the frozen strawberries into the bowl and add sugar, water and lemon juice.
Blend the strawberries together with the liquid as smoothly as possible.
For the cream mixture, first shake the powdered gelatin into a glass or cup and pour cold water over it.
Pour the sweet cream and milk into the clean shrimp.
Take the glasses with the hardened strawberry jelly out of the fridge.
Decorate the dessert as desired before serving.
First, cook the pudding, as it must cool well before preparing the cream.
Let's prepare a biscuit.
Cream the softened butter with regular and vanilla sugar.
Take half of the dough from the total amount, add it to the pan and spread it over the entire surface.
Mix cocoa powder into the rest of the dough.
Apply the dark dough on top of the light dough and spread it evenly over the entire surface and smooth it over the top.
Place the baking tray in the oven, heated to 180 degrees Celsius, for 25 to 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, prepare the cream.
Spread the pudding cream on the cooled biscuit.
Finally, we make a topping out of sweet cream and chocolate cut into pieces, which we pour over the pudding cream.

ingredients.description: juice and finely grated lemon peel (optional)
salt and ground pepper to taste

steps.text: Break off or cut the woody parts of the asparagus and toss them into the shrimp.
About 10 minutes before the base is cooked, peel the onion and garlic and finely chop them separately.
Add the rice and fry it quickly until it becomes glazed, then pour in the white wine.
We begin to gradually pour the hot soup base over the rice.
While the rice is cooking, prepare the spaghetti.
Drain the cooked asparagus, saving a little of the liquid in which it was cooked.
When the risotto is already nicely creamy and the rice is still a bit firm, stir in the asparagus puree.
Meanwhile, melt the saved piece of butter in a clean pan and fry the asparagus tips on it, lightly salt and pepper them.
Serve the risotto on plates.

ingredients.description: salt, ground pepper, and vegetables if desired
oil + extra for greasing the baking sheet and sheets

steps.text: Peel the onion and finely chop it.
When the onion turns glassy and softens a bit, add the minced meat to the pan.
While the meat is roasting, peel, wash and grate the potatoes.
Grease a baking pan (size 35 x 25 centimeters) well with oil.
Cut the remaining leaves in half or trim them to the size of the baking pan.
Cut the unbaked pie with a sharp knife into pieces of any size.
Mix eggs, yogurt, oil, mineral water and salt in a bowl.
Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
When the pie is ready, remove it from the oven and let it stand for 15 minutes.

ingredients.description: salt and ground pepper to taste

steps.text: Cut the chicken breast, pepper and tomato into pieces.
Place a deep pan or a small pot on the cooker and heat the oil in it.
Add rice, garlic and turmeric to the ingredients in the pot and fry everything together for another 2 minutes, stirring constantly, until the rice becomes glazed.
The prepared risotto is served on plates and served with a bowl of salad.
Grind the cookies into crumbs and add vanilla sugar.
Pour the cookie dough into a baking pan (size 20x20 centimeters), which we have previously lined with baking paper.
Thaw the blueberries and puree them.
The preparation process is the same as for the first cream.
Soak the gelatin in cold water and let it stand for 5 minutes to soften.
When the pastry has cooled down well and has completely hardened, cut it into smaller pieces, which you can decorate as desired before serving.
Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic.
Remove the skin from the roasted chicken and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
Heat the oil and butter in a pot.
Cover with soup base or water.
At the end, add chicken, cream, milk and pasta.
Serve the prepared soup on plates.

ingredients.description: of red beans from a can
salt and ground pepper to taste
grated cheese (cheddar, mozzarella, edamame, for pizza, etc.)

steps.text: Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic, and cut the pepper into small pieces.
Pour olive oil into the bowl.
Raise the temperature, add the meat and stir-fry everything together for five minutes until the meat is browned.
Add tomato puree, pelate, paprika powder and cumin.
At the end, stir in the beans, corn and half of the sour cream and season with salt and pepper.
Coat the bottom of a 30 x 25 centimeter baking dish with a little pastry.
Place a portion of the filling on each tortilla and sprinkle a little cheese over it.
Wrap, place in the baking dish with the folded end up and secure with a toothpick.
Spread the rest of the passata on top of the stuffed tortillas and sprinkle with the rest of the cheese.
Cover the baking tray with foil and bake for 20 minutes at 180 degrees Celsius.
Cool the baked tortillas a little.

ingredients.description: pork fillet in a piece (pork fish)
of fresh puff pastry in a roll

steps.text: Peel the garlic and onion and finely chop them separately.
Heat half the oil in a pan and add the chopped onion to it.
Lightly season the pork fish with pepper and salt and fry it nicely on all sides in the remaining heated oil.
Place a large piece of food foil on a clean work surface.
Heat the oven to 170 degrees Celsius.
Place the pork fish wrapped in dough on a baking sheet lined with baking paper.
Remove the batter-baked pork fish from the oven and let it rest for 5 minutes, then cut it into pieces, which are served on plates and offered together with the side dish of your choice.

ingredients.description: olive oil for greasing the pan

steps.text: Mix the crushed yeast in the lukewarm water.
Pour the flour into the bowl and make a well in the middle.
Turn the coarse dough onto a lightly floured work surface, where it is kneaded well.
Lightly flour the bowl (you can also oil it).
Remove the risen dough from the bowl with floured hands and divide it into 250 gram pieces, which we shape into balls.
When you want to prepare a pizza, grease a round pan (or several of them) with a thin layer of oil.

title: Juicy chocolate brownies without white flour

ingredients.description: coconut sugar (you can also use white or brown sugar)

steps.text: Grease a square brownie pan with a side of 20 centimeters with butter and line it with baking paper.
Break or cut the chocolate into pieces and add it together with salt and butter to a fireproof bowl.
Mix the vanilla extract, sugar and eggs into the cooled chocolate with a hand whisk.
Pour the prepared mixture into the pan.
When the biscuit is baked, remove it from the oven.

ingredients.description: fleshy tomatoes (or 2 peeled from a can)

steps.text: Finely chop the garlic and parsley separately.
Pour olive oil into the pan and heat it.
Add mussels, clams and hornbills (tails and whole) to the pan.
Boil the ingredients in the pan a little more, then pour the rice into the pan.
Start gradually pouring the rice with the soup base.
When the beans are cooked 'al dente', which means they are still firm to the bite, add a tablespoon of butter to the risotto.

ingredients.description: chicken meat with bones (backs, necks, wings, thighs, thighs, etc.)
a few grains of black pepper

steps.text: First, let's prepare the chicken soup.
Add the chicken pieces and all the vegetables to a larger pot.
Place the pot on the stove and quickly bring the contents to a boil.
While the soup is cooking, prepare the mass for the spoons.
Gradually mix the semolina into the egg mixture, while stirring everything together all the time.
When the soup is ready, remove the chicken meat, garlic and onion, parsley sprigs and celery, if desired, from the pot.
Spoonfuls can be boiled in salted dill or boiled straight into the soup.
Cover the spoonfuls and cook for 10-15 minutes until they are nicely strained and softened.
The prepared soup and boiled spoonfuls are served in deep plates or soup cups.
Mix cocoa powder, instant coffee powder and hot water in a small bowl.
Melt the chocolate in a water bath or microwave oven.
In a clean bowl, whip the sweet cream and sugar until stiff peaks form.
Then we prepare the biscuit.
Separate the egg whites and yolks into two clean and dry bowls.
Add half the sugar to the egg yolks and beat them at high speed until their volume has tripled.
Mix the egg whites until they begin to foam, then add the rest of the sugar by spoonfuls while continuing to mix.
Pour the prepared mixture onto the baking sheet and spread it evenly over the entire surface with a spatula and smooth the top.
Cool the baked biscuit for 5-10 minutes on a metal rack.
Unwrap the cooled biscuit and cover it with chocolate cream.
Finally, we prepare the chocolate ganache.
Unwrap the cooled roll and place it on a wire rack, under which place a piece of parchment paper.

title: Baked millet porridge with apples and cottage cheese

steps.text: Pour the millet porridge on a thick colander and wash it well with hot water.
When the porridge is cooked, set the pot aside and remove the cinnamon stick and lemon peel.
Separate the egg whites and yolks into two bowls.
Mix lemon peel, cooled cooked porridge and coarsely grated apples into the yolk mixture.
Lubricate the deep baking tray well with butter, then shake the prepared mass into it and spread it evenly over the entire surface and smooth the top.
The growth is good warm or cold.

title: Pasta with salmon sauce from the oven

ingredients.description: any pasta (hearts, bow ties, penne, spaghetti, etc.)

steps.text: Season the salmon fillets with pepper and salt and place them in a baking dish.
Place the baking tray in the oven, heated to 200 degrees Celsius, for about 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, boil a large amount of salted water in a pot.
Just before draining the pasta, pour about 150 ml of the liquid in which the pasta was cooked into the cup.
When the ingredients are properly prepared, remove the pan from the oven.
Stir the drained pasta into the sauce.
Wash the asparagus and break off or cut the woody parts.
Place a pot on the stove and heat two tablespoons of butter or olive oil in it.

Add the garlic to the pot and fry it together with the onion for a minute until fragrant, then add the asparagus cut into pieces and the potatoes, which are quickly fried together with the other ingredients.
Pour in the soup base and season with salt and pepper.
In the meantime, heat the rest of the oil or butter in a pan and fry the saved asparagus tips, lightly salt and pepper them.
When the vegetables have softened, blend the soup smoothly with a hand blender or a blender.
The prepared soup is served in deep plates or soup cups.

title: Yoghurt slices with cereal and fruit

steps.text: Heat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Cut the butter into cubes so that it softens, and grate the lemon peel.
Mix semolina flour, oatmeal, coconut sugar, baking powder and salt in a bowl.
Save the remaining pot of mixture for sprinkling, and spread the rest on the bottom of the baking dish and press gently with the palm of your hand to fill any holes.
In another bowl, mix Greek yogurt, sour cream, sugar and cornstarch.
Bake the pastry in a preheated oven for 45 minutes, and let it stand for two hours before cutting, otherwise keep the bars in the refrigerator.

ingredients.description: fresh strawberries and mint leaves for decoration

steps.text: Place the egg whites, regular sugar and vanilla sugar in the bowl of the food processor and beat lightly.
Mix the egg yolks with regular and vanilla sugar until foamy.
Cover the baking tray with baking paper.
The empty spaces are filled with the yolk mass, which is also sprayed with a dressing bag.
While the dough is baking, make the cream.
Cut the baked dough in half dlwise, turn it over and peel off the baking paper on the bottom side.
First spread the strawberry jam on the cooled biscuit.
Decorate the top of the pastry with jam, powdered sugar and fresh strawberries.
Peel and finely chop the shallots.
Heat the butter and oil in a saucepan.
Stir the spinach leaves into the fried vegetables.
Put the pot aside and blend the soup smoothly with a stick blender.
The prepared soup is served in deep plates or soup cups, garnished with fried tops and served immediately.
Grind the cookies into cookie crumbs and mix in the melted butter.
Greek yogurt is mixed with powdered sugar and grated lemon peel.
When the gelatin sheets soften, squeeze/drain them and dissolve them in the microwave (heat in short intervals of 5 seconds and make sure that the melted gelatin does not boil).
Add a little of the cold yogurt mixture to the dissolved gelatin to temper it.
Pour the yogurt cream onto the biscuit base.
Heat the blueberries, add sugar and blend them into a smooth puree.
When the gelatin is ready, squeeze it out and dissolve it in warm blueberry puree (make sure it's not hot!).
When the cake has cooled, heat the sides of the pan with a kitchen burner (brenner) so that the cream separates a little, then carefully remove it.

title: Baked potatoes with ham and cheese in bechamel sauce

ingredients.description: hams (can also be boiled or baked prosciutto, bacon)

steps.text: Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
We take one potato and place it between two cooking rings, which will prevent the tuber from being cut too much.
Coat the potatoes with oil and season with salt.
Remove the baked potatoes from the oven and let them cool a little.
Pour the bechamel sauce over the stuffed potatoes (recipe HERE) and sprinkle grated cheese on top.

title: Pumpkin gnocchi with quick cheese sauce

steps.text: Heat the oven to 150 degrees Celsius.
Scoop out the meat from the roasted pumpkin and smooth it out.
Place the pumpkin puree in a deep plate lined with paper towels for at least 15 minutes.
Put flour in a bowl and make a well in the middle, into which add pumpkin puree, cottage cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg, nutmeg and salt.
Place the dough on a floured counter and gently roll it out, as it will be very soft.
Heat the butter in a pan.
Stir in the sour cream and cook for 5 minutes while stirring.
Meanwhile, boil water in a large pot, add salt, and then cook the gnocchi in it until they float to the surface.

ingredients.description: 6 pork neck steaks, about one centimeter thick (have your butcher cut this for you)
package of soup vegetables (carrots, celery, leek, parsley root, onion, garlic, paprika)

steps.text: Clean, wash and cut the vegetables into large cubes.
Pour the wine over the fried vegetables and when it is cooked, add the soup base.
Add a teaspoon of ground flour to the cooked vegetables and mix everything together with a stick blender to get a smooth sauce.
While the vegetables are cooking, prepare the steaks.
When the steaks get a nice color, cover them with vegetable sauce.
The steaks in the sauce are served with mashed potatoes, stewed peas and a large bowl of lettuce.

ingredients.description: fresh puff pastry in a roll
Italian spice mix (basil, oregano, rosemary, etc.)
eggs (one for filling and one for coating)

steps.text: Peel the onion and garlic and finely chop them separately.
Heat the oil in a pan and fry the chopped onion until translucent.
Tomato concentrate, tomatoes, celery and garlic are added to the fried meat.
Stir the fried meat and vegetables into a bowl.
We take a baking sheet and roll out a roll of puff pastry on it.
Fold the other half of the dough over the filling and lightly press the edges together with your fingers to seal.
Bake the puff pastry for 20 to 25 minutes in a preheated oven at 190 degrees Celsius.

ingredients.description: salt and ground pepper to taste

steps.text: Wash the courgettes and cut them into rings.
In the pot in which we will cook the soup, heat a little olive oil or melt a piece of butter in it.
Pour the soup base over the vegetables.
Pour the millet porridge into a colander and rinse it well under hot water.
Put the pot aside and blend the cooked vegetables with a stick blender to get a thick soup.
The prepared soup is served in deep plates or soup cups.
Heat the oven to 190 degrees Celsius.
Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl: flour, baking soda, cinnamon and salt.
Peel the bananas and add them to a clean bowl, where we mash them well with a fork.
Pour the banana mass into the bowl with the dry ingredients and quickly mix everything together with a spatula so that the ingredients combine into a uniform mass.
Half fill the baskets or wells of the muffin pan with the prepared mixture.
Bake the muffins in the preheated oven for 18 to 20 minutes.
Cool the baked muffins in the pan for 5 minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack and let them cool completely.

title: Baked dumplings with ham and cheese

ingredients.description: cloth (you can also use other short pasta)
cheese that melts well (Edamec, Gouda, etc.)

steps.text: Boil the cloths in a large amount of salted water.
Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
Heat a little oil in a pan and fry the sliced ​​ham.
Mix egg yolks and sour cream in a bowl.
First mix the ham into the drained cloths.
Shake the prepared mixture into the pan and spread it over the entire surface.
Heat the butter to room temperature, then beat it together with the sugar for 3 minutes with an electric mixer to obtain a light and fluffy butter mixture.
Using a spatula, stir in the yellow petals that we plucked from the dandelion flowers.
Add flour and salt and quickly knead the dough, flatten it, wrap it in cling film and store it in the fridge for half an hour.
Heat the oven to 160 degrees Celsius.
Dust the dough with flour and roll it half a centimeter thick between two sheets of baking paper.
Bake the cookies in a preheated oven for 20 minutes.

title: Baked potatoes with asparagus and bacon

steps.text: Turn on the oven and set it to 220 degrees Celsius.
Meanwhile, peel the onion and cut it into slices.
Cut or break off woody parts of asparagus.
Remove the pan from the oven.
Pour over the dish with a little olive oil and sprinkle with lemon juice before serving.

ingredients.description: olive oil + extra for greasing the pan and dough
fresh vegetables and sprigs of herbs for decoration

steps.text: Knead a smooth dough from flour, lukewarm water, yeast, salt and oil.
Let the dough rise in a covered bowl until it doubles in size.
Divide the risen dough into smaller pieces and stretch them with the palm of your hand on an oiled baking sheet.
Oil the rolled out dough a little more, and then 'prick' it with the tips of your fingers to make indentations.
Place vegetables and herbs on the dough in any shape you like.
Bake the prepared focaccia for about 15 minutes at 250 degrees Celsius.
First, the dandelion flowers are carefully cleaned and all the carrion is removed from them.
Place the dandelion flowers in a pot and cover with one liter of cold water.
Strain the still-hot broth through a thick sieve or cheesecloth.
Pour the hot syrup into clean glasses (or bottles).

title: Vanilla panna cotta with strawberry topping

steps.text: Pour the gelatin into a bowl and mix it with cold water.
Pour milk and sweet cream into the shrimp.
Just before the cream boils, remove the shrimp and remove the vanilla pod.
Pour the prepared mixture into clean glasses.
Clean the strawberries and cut them into pieces.
Blend the strawberry sauce smoothly with a hand mixer.
Wait for the strawberry topping to cool to room temperature, then spoon it over the hardened panna cotta.
Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
Crack the eggs into a large bowl and beat them together with regular and vanilla sugar for 5 minutes.
Stir in the walnuts, oil, milk and finally the flour, which we previously mixed with baking powder.
Pour the mixture into the pan and smooth the top.
Cut the cooled biscuit in half to get two equal halves.
Sprinkle the pastry with powdered sugar before cutting.

ingredients.description: at least 100 g of nettle tops
of olive oil for greasing the baking pan

steps.text: Wash the nettle tops (we use gloves so that the nettle does not 'burn' us).
Place both flours, baking powder and salt in a bowl and mix the ingredients.
Divide the mass into two parts.
Grease the baking pan with olive oil, then use a spoon to alternately fold both masses into it.
Bake the casserole for 30 minutes at 200 degrees Celsius.
Decorate the baked dish with sour cream and serve.
Wash the smoked neck, place in a pot and cover with enough cold water to completely cover the meat.
Cut the bread into cubes, put them in a bowl and pour enough of the liquid in which the neck was cooked to moisten the bread well.
Crack the eggs into a bowl, season with salt and pepper and whisk.
Heat the oven to 160 degrees Celsius.

ingredients.description: any decoration (chocolate or sugar eggs, marzipan figurines, grated chocolate, etc.

steps.text: Melt the chocolate over a water bath and cool it to room temperature.
Separate the whites from the yolks.
Beat the egg yolks until foamy and mix them into the melted chocolate.
Pour the prepared cream into jars and put it in the refrigerator for at least two hours.
Before serving, whip the cream (1 dl) and put it on the cooled cream.

title: Horseradish with eggs and pumpkin oil

steps.text: Peel the horseradish and grate it finely.
Boil the eggs until hard, i.e. boil them for 10 minutes.
Add pumpkin oil to the horseradish and eggs and mix the ingredients.
Mix the yeast and sugar into the milk.
Sift the flour into a large bowl and mix it with salt.
Roll out the risen dough on a floured work surface into a rectangle about 0.5 cm thick, which is cut dlwise into 6 equally wide strips.

We take three strips and join them together at the top, then braid them into a braid, which is cut in half to get two braids, in which the strips at the upper and lower ends are tightly pressed together so that they do not unravel when baking.
Meanwhile, heat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
If we want very soft braids, cover them with a damp kitchen towel after baking.

title: Stuffed Easter eggs (dyed in beetroot juice)

steps.text: Wash, peel and cut the beets into slices.
When the cooked beets have cooled completely, strain them through a fine sieve.
Remove the eggs from the juice and let them dry.
Add mayonnaise, mustard and spices to the mashed egg yolks.
Heat the oven to 160 degrees Celsius.
Separate the yolks from the whites in two bowls.
Mix the egg yolks with grated carrots, coconut flour, 20 grams of sugar, oil, orange juice and zest, and vanilla extract.
Sift the flour into a large bowl and mix it with baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt.
Beat the egg whites until foamy.
Stir a third of the snow into the carrot mixture, then gently stir in the rest.
Bake the biscuit for 18 to 20 minutes, until it turns golden brown on top.
Place a clean piece of baking paper on top of the biscuit and turn it over again with the help of a wire rack so that the paper is at the bottom this time.
Meanwhile, prepare the cream.
Unroll the biscuit carefully and cover it evenly with the cream, saving some of the cream for decoration.
Put the rest of the cream in a serving bag and decorate the roulade as desired.

ingredients.description: sesame seeds, poppy seeds, coconut flour...

steps.text: Pour milk into the shrimp, add butter, sugar and salt.
Sift the flour into a large bowl and make a well in the middle.
When the yeast rises, add a little beaten egg and rum.
Shape the dough into a loaf.
Turn the risen dough onto the counter, knead it a little and divide it into 10 equal parts.
Pinch off a small piece from each piece and shape it into a ball.
Place the balls in the holes or
Line a larger baking tray with baking paper and arrange the bunnies on it.
Before baking, beat the egg together with two tablespoons of water.
Bake the leavened bunnies in a heated oven for 15 minutes until they are nicely colored, and then cool them a little on the wire rack.

ingredients.description: salt and ground pepper to taste

steps.text: Peel the garlic and onion and chop them separately.
Place a large pot on the stove and heat the oil in it.
Add minced meat.
Stir in cumin, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper and tomato concentrate.
Add the rice and pour in the soup base.
When the rice is cooked, put the pot aside.

ingredients.description: a cube of kvass (or a little less if the taste of kvass bothers you too much)
dry tarragon (two bags) or one handful of fresh and finely chopped tarragon

steps.text: First, we prepare the yeast dough.
Pour a mixture of eggs, vanilla, sugar, salt, oil, yolk and the rest of the milk into a bowl.
While the dough is rising, prepare the filling.
Roll out the risen dough about half a centimeter thick.
Cut the roll in half down the middle so that it still holds together at the top.
Carefully place the braid in a narrow oblong baking dish, which we have greased with butter, and immediately bake it in an oven heated to 180 degrees Celsius.
When the braid is baked, let it cool in the baking pan, then turn it out onto a board and sprinkle with powdered sugar.

title: Cemaž gnocchi with cottage cheese and almonds

ingredients.description: fresh cottage cheese (it can also be rokota)

steps.text: Wash the potatoes well and boil them in their skins.
Add a spoonful of cottage cheese, butter and salt to the mashed potatoes.
Add a little oil to the cheese and mix it smoothly.
Mix one large spoonful of mixed cream into the cooled potato mass.
The dough is made into inch-thick 'sausages', which are cut into gnocchi of any size with the blunt side of a knife or a cleaver.
Cook the gnocchi in salted dill for about 3 minutes.
Add a spoonful of chopped fennel, a little oil and a few spoonfuls of the water in which the gnocchi are cooked to the pan.
Pour water into the shrimp, add butter and salt and heat until boiling.
Mix the egg and cornmeal into the cooled polenta.
For the sauce, finely chop the shallot and garlic, and cut the tomatoes into strips.
Heat the oil in a large pan and fry the shallots in it for 2 minutes.
Pour cream and chicken stock into the pan or
At the end, stir in the spinach and Parmesan and cook everything together just until the spinach wilts a little or softens.

ingredients.description: hard cheese that melts nicely (gouda, edamame, etc.)
oil (for potatoes and greasing the pan)

steps.text: Peel the potatoes, wash them and cut them into thin slices, which are thrown into a bowl.
If necessary, wash the pork chops and dry them well with paper towels.
Grease the baking pan with oil, then add the potatoes and spread them over the entire surface.
Cover the pan with a lid or seal it with aluminum foil.

title: Baked pancakes with minced meat and vegetables

ingredients.description: oil for baking pancakes and greasing the pan
carrot (could also be zucchini, bell pepper, etc.)

steps.text: First, prepare the pancake batter.
Start mixing the ingredients in the well with a hand whisk or mixer and while mixing, gradually scoop the flour around the well.
Meanwhile, prepare the filling.
Heat the oil in a pan, and first add the chopped onion.
Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
Add a little filling to each patty, then roll it into a roll.
At the end, prepare the topping by breaking the eggs in a bowl and mixing them with sour cream.
Bake the pancakes for about 20 minutes in a preheated oven.

ingredients.description: savoiardi biscuits (you can also use bebe or lady fingers)

steps.text: Take about 2/3 of the strawberries from the total quantity and cut them into pieces (reserve the remaining strawberries for later).
Separate the egg whites and yolks into two bowls.
Mix the mascarpone slowly and by spoonfuls into the yolk mixture.
Mix milk and strawberry juice or syrup in a shallower container.
When the biscuits have completely covered the bottom of the baking pan, spread 1/3 of the mascarpone cream on them and spread it thickly as evenly as possible and level it.
Before serving the dessert, cut the remaining strawberries into slices and arrange them neatly on top of the dessert to completely cover the cream.

title: Vanilla cream for baskets and boats

steps.text: Crack the egg and yolk in a bowl.
Pour milk and 100 ml of sweet cream into the shrimp.
When tiny bubbles appear around the edge of the shrimp, remove the shrimp and remove the vanilla bean from the hot liquid.
Put the hot milk and cream back on the heat and slowly pour the egg mixture into the shrimp, stirring all the time with a whisk.
Stir the butter into the hot cream.
Immediately pour the prepared cream into a clean container or bowl and cover it to the touch with cling film (to prevent a crust from forming on the surface).
Just before using the cream, whip 200 ml of sweet cream in a bowl and slowly mix it into the cooled cream.
First, let's prepare the biscuit.
Sift flour mixed with baking powder onto the egg mass and mix it in lightly to obtain a uniform mass without lumps.
Line a low pan for baking rolls with baking pepper.

When the sponge cake is baked, while it is still hot, roll it onto a clean kitchen towel (or a clean sheet of baking paper), which we have previously sprinkled with powdered sugar, and wrap it together with the towel into a roll.
For the walnut filling, boil the cream, sugar and rum in a saucepan.
For the curd cream, soak the gelatin in cold water and let it stand for 10 minutes.
Drain the soaked gelatin and dissolve it in the microwave.
Spread two-thirds of the cold curd cream over the light biscuit.
Spread the roulade with the rest of the curd cream and decorate it as desired.
Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
Mix olive oil and mineral water in a bowl.
Mix the remaining ingredients, i.e. cottage cheese, yogurt, sour cream, eggs, milk and salt.
Bake for 45 minutes and let rest for 10 minutes before cutting.

ingredients.description: olive oil (you can also use sunflower oil)

steps.text: Pound the steaks a little on both sides, then salt and pepper them.
Pour oil into the pan in which we will cook the steaks and add butter.
Remove the fried steaks from the pan and keep them on a plate.
Mix well with a food processor so that there are no lumps in the sauce, and then return the steaks to the pan together with the liquid that was released from the meat during the rest.
The preparation of the steak is served on plates.

ingredients.description: juice and finely grated rind of half a lemon
finely grated rind of half a lemon

steps.text: First, let's prepare the shortcrust pastry.
Grease a round pan with a removable rim with butter and flour (remove excess flour).
Pour the milk into the shrimp and bring it to a slow boil at a moderate temperature.
Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius, insert the oven rack into the lowest guide.
Set the shrimp aside and mix the raisins, sugar, butter, lemon peel and juice and ground almonds into the cooked semolina.
Heat the jam in a saucepan.
Cool the baked cake, then carefully remove it from the pan and serve it on a nice plate or tray.

title: Risotto with spicy peppers and carrots

ingredients.description: rice for risottos or side dishes
a little spring onion (only the green part)

steps.text: Fry the rice and the spicy pepper cut into rings in olive oil until the rice is glazed and the pepper is fragrant.
Add diced carrots and cover with a deciliter of wine.
During further cooking, gradually pour in the soup base, using ladles, until the rice is cooked, or is still firm to the bite.
At the end, stir in half a spoonful of butter and finely chopped spring onion (only the green part) into the risotto.

title: Buckwheat risotto with mushrooms and spinach

ingredients.description: 500 - 750 ml of hot vegetable soup base

steps.text: Clean the sponges with a damp cloth (or rinse them quickly under running water).
Place a pan on the stove and melt 1 tablespoon of butter in it.
Peel the onion and finely chop it.
Add the buckwheat porridge and stir-fry it for 1 minute, then cover it with white wine.
Remove the thyme sprigs from the cooked porridge, then add the spinach.
Dissolve the butter in warm milk.
Mix everything together with the sifted flour, to which we have added yeast and a pinch of salt.
Let's prepare the filling.
Roll out the risen dough on a floured work surface to a thickness of a few millimeters and cover it with the poppy seed filling.
Cut the wreath with a sharp knife on the outside into pieces about 2 centimeters wide (the dough should still hold together on the inside).
Heat the oven to 170 degrees Celsius.
Bake the poppy flower in the preheated oven for about 45 minutes.

ingredients.description: Pelatas or diced tomatoes (or 3 fresh tomatoes)
parmesan cheese and parsley for serving (optional)

steps.text: Cut the meat into bite-sized pieces and salt them.
Heat the oil or lard in a pan, then fry the onion on it.
Add the garlic and mix, then add all the other ingredients, i.e. tomato puree, pelate, marjoram, bay leaf and water.
Towards the end of cooking, boil a large pot of salted water and cook the macaroni in it.
Cook for another minute, then serve, with Parmesan cheese and chopped parsley, if desired.

ingredients.description: thin-skinned baking potatoes (smaller tubers, about the same size)
a few sprigs of fresh parsley

steps.text: Heat the oven to 220 degrees Celsius.
Wash the potatoes well and boil them in salted water for about 25 minutes in their skins.
Drain the potatoes well and arrange them on a large baking sheet lined with baking paper.
After 15 minutes of baking, turn the fries over, drizzle with oil and season.
Salt and pepper the chicken medallions on both sides.
Heat the oil in a pan and quickly fry the seasoned medallions on both sides.
Lower the temperature and add butter to the pan.
Pour the soup base into the pan in which the meat was cooked.
Pour in the cream and mix the gročica into the sauce.
The medallions in the sauce are served together with the selected side dish.
Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
Pour the millet porridge on a strainer and rinse it well under running water.
While the porridge is cooking, cut the onion into thicker slices, chop the garlic, cut the pepper into strips, carrots into rings, mushrooms into slices and cabbage into strips.
Heat the olive oil and the rest of the butter in a large pan.
Separately mix sour cream, eggs and grated cheese.
The prepared dish is served on plates and served together with a salad.
Heat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Mix flour, baking powder and salt in a bowl.
Wash and peel the apples.
In another bowl, use an electric mixer to cream the softened butter and sugar.
Add a mixture of dry ingredients to the mixture and stir it in with a kitchen spoon or spatula.
Pour the prepared mass into the baking pan and spread it over the entire surface with a spatula.
Bake the pastry in a preheated oven for 35-40 minutes.

title: Pork goulash with cream and paprika

steps.text: Cut the meat into bite-sized pieces and roll them in a mixture of flour, ground paprika, salt and pepper.
Clean and wash the peppers and mushrooms.
Heat the oil in a large pan and fry the meat cubes until golden brown.
Pour a little more oil into the pan, then fry the onion, mushrooms and pepper in it for five minutes.
At the end, add garlic.
At the end, stir in more cooking cream, heat until boiling and set aside.
The prepared dish is served with chopped parsley and a selected side dish.

ingredients.description: a few sprigs of fresh parsley
a few sprigs of fresh herbs (thyme, rosemary, marjoram, oregano, etc.)

steps.text: Peel the garlic and onion and finely chop them separately.
Shake the fried onion and garlic in a bowl and leave to cool.
Add minced meat and spices to the cooled onion and garlic.
Wipe the pan with a kitchen towel and put it back on the cooker.
Baked meatballs are served on plates and served together with the selected side dish.
Lightly salt and pepper the pork steaks on both sides.
Place the fried steaks on a plate and cover to keep the steaks warm.
After about 2 minutes, add mustard and cream.
Serve the steaks on plates and pour over the prepared sauce.

ingredients.description: tuberous and root vegetables (carrots, parsley root, celery)

steps.text: Pour 2 liters of water into a large pot.
While the soup is cooking, prepare a smooth mass from flour, egg and salt, from which bake two pancakes in a greased pan.
Peel and finely chop the garlic.
Wash and dry the chicken breasts with paper towels.
Spread the chicken mixture on the pancakes, roll them up and wrap them separately in food foil, which is tightly pressed together at the ends to get two oblong 'candies'.
Cut the remaining vegetables into cubes.
Remove the cooked meat from the chicken backs and finely chop it.

title: Baked oatmeal with apples and raisins

ingredients.description: butter (and a little more for greasing the pan)

steps.text: Heat the oven to 170 degrees Celsius.
In a large bowl, mix oatmeal, raisins, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon and salt.
In another bowl, mix the eggs, milk, melted butter and vanilla extract.
Peel the apples and cut them into pieces, which are mixed into the mixture.
Pour everything into a baking dish and bake in a heated oven for 40 minutes.
Mix flour, baking powder and salt in a bowl.
Place the dough on a floured board and roll it out to form a square approximately 40 x 40 centimeters in size.
Cut the dough into 5 strips, about 8 centimeters wide.
Fold the dough from the left and right sides over the filling and gently squeeze both edges of the strip with your fingers, so that the filling is closed.
Use a sharp knife to cut the dough rolls into approximately 6-centimeter long 'strudels', place them in a baking tray lined with baking paper and bake for 15 minutes at 180 degrees Celsius.

title: Quick walnut cake with mascarpone cream

steps.text: Cover the semolina with milk and let it stand for 5 minutes to strain.
Put the mascarpone, sweet cream and sugar in a mixer and beat until you get a smooth cream.
Cool the pastry well before serving.

title: Lasagna with chicken, mushrooms and spinach

steps.text: Mix the ricotta, milk, egg and half of the grated cheese in a bowl.
Peel the onion and garlic and finely chop them separately.
Heat the oil in a large pan and add the chopped onion.
Add minced meat and fry further.
Pour in the cooking cream and stir in the mustard.
Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
First, pour half of the ricotta mixture into the baking dish.
Bake the lasagna in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes.

ingredients.description: two pieces of thawed puff pastry (or 2 rolls of fresh puff pastry)

steps.text: Roll out both pieces of puff pastry on a lightly floured work surface to the size of a baking sheet (approximately 23 x 30 centimeters).
Pierce both pieces of rolled dough with a fork in several places and bake at 180 degrees Celsius for about 13 minutes until they become honey or golden brown in color.
Mix the egg yolks, vanilla sugar and 6 tablespoons of regular sugar for about 10 minutes to form a light, pale yellow and fluffy mass.
Pour the remaining milk into the shrimp and boil.
Beat the egg whites and 2 tablespoons of sugar until stiff peaks form.
Place a piece of baked puff pastry in the pan.
Whip the sweet cream and carefully spread it on the cooled cream.

ingredients.description: butter for greasing the baking pan

steps.text: Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
Sift the flour into a bowl and mix it with sugar, cinnamon and salt.
Wash, peel and cut the apples into quarters.
Pour the batter into the prepared pan.
Cool the baked rise a little, then sprinkle it with powdered sugar on top.

title: Potato wedges with vegetables, prosciutto and cheese

ingredients.description: spinach (or dandelion, swiss chard, radicchio, kale)
cooked prosciutto (can also be ham or bacon)
butter for greasing the baking pan

steps.text: Grease a round baking pan or cake mold with a removable rim with butter and sprinkle with breadcrumbs.
Peel the potatoes, cut them into pieces and boil them in salted water until soft.
Chop the onion and garlic, cut the pepper into shorter strips.
Pour olive oil into the pan and fry the onion for 3 minutes.
Mash the cooled potatoes and mix them with egg, salt and pepper.
Spread half of the potatoes by spoonfuls on the bottom of the baking dish.
Place slices of cooked prosciutto in the cavity and arrange the vegetables on top.
Sprinkle the grated mozzarella over the vegetables, and then spread the rest of the potatoes on top by spoonfuls, which this time do not press down.
Bake the topping, or potato 'cake', in a heated oven for about 35 minutes, and cool the dish a little before slicing.

title: Puff pastry with jam and mascarpone

ingredients.description: 1 package of fresh puff pastry in a roll (275 g)
mascarpone cheese (can also be cream cheese or ricotta)

steps.text: Heat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Unroll the puff pastry and place it on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Spread the mascarpone in the middle of the dough and spread the strawberry jam on it.
Cut the dough at the bottom and top and fold it over the filling.
Cut the left and right sides of the dough into strips, as shown in the photo below.
We intertwine the strips of dough on the left and right sides to form a beautiful braid.
Coat the braid with the rest of the beaten egg.
Place the pan in the heated oven, where the braid is baked for 25-30 minutes.
Cool the baked braid a little, then sprinkle it with powdered sugar, cut it into pieces and serve.
Cut stale bread into approximately 1.5 cm thick slices.
Place a deep pan on the cooker and heat a layer of oil in it.
Place the fried slices on paper towels to drain excess fat.
Peel the potatoes, cut them into pieces and boil them in salted water.
Drain and mash the boiled potatoes.
Add the eggs and salt to the cooled potatoes and slowly add the spicy flour.
Pinch off a piece the size of a walnut from the whole lump of dough and roll it between your palms to make a roll.
Cook the dumplings in salted water for a few minutes, or until they float to the surface.
Melt two tablespoons of butter in a pan and fry two tablespoons of crumbs in the fat.

ingredients.description: a wrap of fresh puff pastry in a roll

steps.text: Heat the oven to 175 degrees Celsius.
Take one roll of puff pastry and roll it out and flour it.
Place the second piece of rolled out puff pastry on the greased dough.
We hold each strip separately at both ends and twist it into a spiral.
Place the twisted sticks of puff pastry on a baking sheet and brush the top with a beaten egg.
Bake the Nutella sticks in a heated oven for 20 minutes until they are nicely colored.

ingredients.description: grated mozzarella (or any other cheese that melts well)
salt and freshly ground pepper (to taste)

steps.text: First, let's prepare the Bolognese sauce.
Heat the oil in a larger, deeper pan.
Add minced meat to the pan.
Add bay leaf and mix all the spices and sauce.
About 15 minutes before the end of cooking the sauce, boil a large amount of salted water in the pot.
Heat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius.
Shake the prepared mixture into a large baking dish and spread it over the entire surface with a spatula.

title: Chicken steaks in cream sauce with sun-dried tomatoes

steps.text: Season the chicken steaks on both sides with salt and freshly ground pepper.
First, heat the oil in a pan, then fry the seasoned steaks in it.
Add shallots and sliced ​​tomatoes to the pan.
Raise the temperature a little and let the liquid boil gently for about 5 minutes, until about half of it boils.
Reduce the temperature to medium and pour the sweet cream into the pan.
Garnish the prepared dish with fresh basil leaves.

title: Sea bream in the oven with potatoes

steps.text: Peel and wash the potatoes.
Wash the fish under running water and dry them well with paper towels.
Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
Cut the top of the fish (make 2-3 cuts in each), then place them on top of the ingredients in the baking dish.
Place the baking tray in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes.

title: Peppers with potatoes in the oven

ingredients.description: 1 tablespoon of homemade spice mix (homemade vegetables or spices to your own taste)

steps.text: Cut the peppers in half dlwise, remove the seeds and wash them.
Put the sliced ​​potatoes, garlic, onion, salt, pepper, water and spice mixture in the baking pan and mix right in the baking pan.
Arrange the ingredients in the baking dish, then spread the pepper halves over them, which have been salted beforehand.
Bake the dish for about 35 minutes in an oven heated to 200 degrees Celsius.
When the peppers and potatoes get a nice color, take the pan out of the oven and pour a deciliter of sweet cream after the meal.
Lightly grease the bottom of a round cake pan (diameter 22 centimeters) with butter and line it with baking paper.
Slowly melt the butter in a saucepan over low heat.
Quickly mix cream cheese, mascarpone, powdered sugar and grated lemon peel in a bowl.
Beat the sweet cream for a minute or two, then slowly add the gelatin while mixing.
Pour the cream onto the biscuit base and spread it nicely over the entire surface and smooth the top.
Clean the strawberries, if necessary, rinse them quickly under running water and dry them.
According to the instructions on the package, prepare a red cake topping from 250 ml of water and pour it over the strawberries.

ingredients.description: small onion (can be half as big)
chopped tomato cores (you can also peel or pieces of tomatoes
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

steps.text: Peel the onion and garlic and finely chop them separately.
Place a large, deep pan or a larger pot on the cooker.
Add the minced meat to the container and fry it, stirring occasionally, until it falls apart and turns brown.
Stir in tomato concentrate, bay leaf and chopped garlic.
When the sauce is ready, serve it with pasta, gnocchi or use it to prepare lasagna.

title: Raw tortellini with broccoli and bacon

steps.text: Place a pot with a large amount of water for cooking the tortellini on the cooker.
While the tortellini are cooking, fry the bacon cut into sticks or pieces in a pan.
Drain the cooked tortellini and broccoli well, pour into the pan with the sauce and mix everything well.

title: Pancakes with cottage cheese and raisins

steps.text: In a bowl, using a whisk or an electric mixer, mix the eggs, milk, oil, sugar and salt until smooth.
Pick and wash the raisins.
Pour a little oil into the heated pancake pan and spread it over the entire surface by tilting the pan (pour the excess oil into a container).
Baked pancakes are covered with cottage cheese filling, after which we sprinkle soaked raisins.
Cut the meat across the fibers into as thin slices or strips as possible, and season with salt and ground pepper.
Clean and wash the young bulb.
Place a large pan (wok) on the cooker and heat a tablespoon of oil in it.
Pour the rest of the oil into the pan.
Stir in the prepared sauce.
Add the spring onion to the pan and let the dish cook for another minute or so, so that the sauce thickens completely.
The prepared dish is served on plates and served with boiled rice.

title: Short pastry with pudding cream and strawberries

ingredients.description: vanilla sugar (you can also use less if the strawberries are very sweet)

steps.text: Sift flour, powdered sugar and baking powder into a bowl.
Form one third of the dough into a ball, wrap it in transparent foil and store it in the freezer.
Thinly coat a baking pan (size approx. 19 x 30 centimeters) with melted butter and flour.
Roll out the remaining dough between two sheets of baking paper or on a lightly floured work surface to the size of a baking sheet.
Mix the pudding powder in a bowl smoothly with a few tablespoons of cold milk.
Pour the remaining milk into the shrimp and add 4 tablespoons of sladkor.
Set the shrimp aside and stir the sour cream into the hot pudding.
Beat the egg whites until stiff, and add a spoonful of sugar at the end.
Pour the cream onto the dough and spread it evenly over it with a spatula.
Take the dough out of the freezer and grate it roughly and evenly over the strawberries.
Cool the baked pastry well before serving.

ingredients.description: pork fish or pork fillet (approx. 600 g)
a few sprigs of fresh thyme

steps.text: Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
Put the carrots and garlic in a baking dish, cover both with the prepared dressing and mix well.
Meanwhile, mix cumin, red pepper and salt in a bowl and rub the pork fish well with the mixture.
Remove the foil from the baking tray and place the pork fish between the carrots.

ingredients.description: grated cheese (e.g. parmesan, gouda, cheddar, etc.)

steps.text: Peel the onion and garlic and finely chop them separately.
Heat one tablespoon of oil in a large pan.
Transfer the fried meat to a plate, and heat the remaining oil in a pan.
Season the sauce with Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper and spices.
While the sauce is cooking, prepare the potatoes.
Drain the boiled potatoes and put them back in the pot in which they were cooked.
Heat the oven to 210 degrees Celsius.
Serve the baked pie immediately.

ingredients.description: oil (pork fat can also be used)

steps.text: Wash and dry the meat with paper towels.
Place a large pot on the stove and heat the oil in it.
Add the onion to the pot in which the meat was roasted and simmer it, stirring occasionally, covered, until it is almost completely softened.
Return the fried meat to the pot and add the tomato concentrate and ground paprika.
Peel the potatoes, wash them and cut them into pieces about 1.5 centimeters in size.
Goulash soup is served in deep plates or soup cups.

ingredients.description: chicken steaks (can also be mini fillets or thighs without bones and skin)
fresh mushrooms (white or brown champignons, porcini mushrooms can also be used)
chicken stock (water can also be used)

steps.text: Clean the mushrooms and, if necessary, rinse them very quickly under running water to remove any remaining soil.
Season the chicken steaks on both sides with salt and ground pepper.
In the same pan in which we fried the steaks, add a tablespoon of butter and half a tablespoon of oil.
Pour cream and chicken stock into the pan.
Return the browned steaks to the sauce, together with the juice that was released from them during the rest, and let the dish cook on moderate heat for another 10 minutes.
The steaks in the sauce are served on plates.

title: Hake with potatoes and vegetables from the oven

ingredients.description: half of a smaller Hokkaido pumpkin

steps.text: Heat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius.
If desired, peel the potatoes and cut them into thin slices.
Put all the vegetables on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil, salt and mix.
Meanwhile, salt and oil the hake fillets.
Arrange the fillets on top of the vegetables, and place cubes of butter, slices of garlic and lemon wedges on top.
Lower the temperature to 180 degrees Celsius and bake everything together for another 10 to 15 minutes.

ingredients.description: cream cheese, warmed to room temperature

steps.text: Heat the oven to 160 degrees Celsius.
Mix ground cookies with melted butter.
Put the baking sheet in the heated oven for 8-10 minutes, so that the biscuit base is golden brown.
While the base is baking, prepare the filling.
Pour the prepared filling onto the biscuit base and spread it evenly with a spatula and smooth it over the top.
Store the baking dish in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours, preferably overnight, so that the filling cools down and hardens.
For the lemon cream, add lemon juice and zest, egg, sugar, water and cornstarch to the shrimp.
Strain the lemon cream through a thick strainer, then mix in the butter cut into pieces.
Cut the prepared pastry into pieces, place them on a plate or tray and serve.
